resources.string:
Hello,

Thank you for downloading our application! At Eden Nails, we're committed to providing exceptional nail art services.

Please note that currently, we are accepting nail art orders exclusively within the Ahmedabad city area. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.

Our team is dedicated to delivering high-quality nail art designs and ensuring your satisfaction with every appointment.

Thank you for choosing Eden Nails. We look forward to serving you and enhancing your nail art experience!

Best regards,
Eden Nails
